title: Satellite Vu
description: Satellite Vu was founded in 2016 with the aim to fill the void in high resolution thermal data from space. It has, since then, turned into a high-growth space tech company poised to help the globe address its sustainability challenges through high-resolution thermal imaging.  We are on a quest to ensure any structure on the planet is energy efficient and support the reduction of businessesâ€™ carbon footprint.  In near real-time, we will use Infrared technology to monitor the Earth and will be able to assess and determine insights into economic activity. This will allow businesses to make decisions in order to become more environmentally friendly.
